recipe.title: Spinach Artichoke Quinoa Casserole
recipe.step: Wash quinoa drain it then place in a pot with the 2 cups of water. Bring to the boil then lower to a simmer and place lid on the pot and cook until water absorbed (about 10-15 minutes.) Spray baking dish with oil and set aside. Meanwhile heat oil in a large pan or a pot. Cook the garlic for about 3-5 minutes. In a small cup mix corn flour with a couple of TBsp of milk until smooth. Add this to the rest of the milk. In the milk to the pan, with artichoke heart, spinach, crushed stock cube, quinoa (which has been mixed with a fork), tasty cheese and salt and pepper. Stir until cheese is melted. Pour into prepared baking dish, sprinkle the top with Parmesan cheese and bake for 25 minutes or until top golden. Serve hot with side salad if desired. *If using frozen artichokes- thaw and drain.
